title: OpenAI GPT-5 Demo: Revolutionary Reasoning in Action
summary: Watch the first live demonstration of GPT-5's advanced reasoning capabilities, showing how it solves complex multi-step problems that stumped previous models.

title: Meta's Code Llama 3: A New Era for AI-Powered Programming
summary: Meta releases Code Llama 3 with unprecedented coding abilities, outperforming GPT-4 across multiple programming languages and complex algorithmic challenges.

title: DeepMind's AlphaFold 3 Maps All 200 Million Known Proteins
summary: Google DeepMind achieves complete protein structure prediction for all known proteins, opening unprecedented opportunities in drug discovery and biological research.

title: Anthropic Claude 4 Shows Human-Level Performance on Complex Reasoning
summary: Latest benchmarks reveal Anthropic's Claude 4 achieving human-level performance on complex reasoning tasks, marking a significant milestone in AI development.

title: AI Infrastructure Startup Secures Record $800M Series C
summary: CoreWeave announces massive funding round to build next-generation AI training infrastructure, signaling massive investor confidence in AI hardware space.

title: MIT Researchers Develop Energy-Efficient AI Chip Architecture
summary: New chip design reduces AI model training energy consumption by 75% while maintaining performance, addressing sustainability concerns in large-scale AI.
